prompt: Add a search bar to the dashboard that filters the table of results.

assertions.text: At least 3 fundamentally different paradigms explored (e.g., client-side filtering vs server-side search vs hybrid — not just 3 React component approaches)
At least 5 total concrete approaches documented across paradigms
Problem is unpacked beyond 'add a search bar' — surfaces hidden complexity like data volume, match semantics, URL state, accessibility, performance
At least 2 explicit assumptions identified (e.g., data size, search semantics like fuzzy vs exact, whether results are paginated)
A structured comparison of approaches against specific criteria
At least 1 non-obvious consideration surfaced (e.g., URL state sync for shareability, debouncing strategy, column-specific filtering, saved searches)
Final recommendation explains why it's the right fit for this context, not just the simplest option
Rejected alternatives have documented reasons for why they were not chosen
